nodes.text: "Bight Size" was a song that played on the radio station BSO 401.72 in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu in 34 ABY. Palob Godalhi, the station's host, declared that "Bight Size" was one of his favorite songs ever after it played.

"Bight Size" was created for the themed land Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which opened to guests at Disneyland Park and Disney's Hollywood Studios Park in 2019. It can be heard playing during the land's background radio loop.
